description: Sudden snow sometimes calls for immediate snow angels. A waterproof leather upper and lighweight synthetic insulation means the Chillberg is ready to play when you are, no matter what the thermometer says. A synthetic heel and durable lugged sole stand up to the demands of snow days and winter walks to school. The side zip entry combines with a D-ring lacing system for quick removal when it’s time to come in for supper.Upper is premium waterproof leather.PrimaLoft® synthetic insulation is warm and lightweight.Comfy padded collar with faux fur lining.Side zip for easy on and off.D-ring lacing system is quick to adjust and easy to lace.Synthetic heel kick adds durability in a high-wear area.Ortholite® footbed and nylon shank provide cushioning and arch support.Durable lugged rubber outsole.
name: Timberland Chillberg Waterproof Mid Insulated Boots - Children to Youths
